desc.en: BG_IndoorPlaza_Night2.jpg Description
desc.jp: BG_IndoorPlaza_Night2.jpg Description

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程师部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在桃一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃等人立刻继续前进。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程师部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.zh_cn: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.

desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵去见研讨会的部长莉音。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来阳葵遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央与日鞠秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音与阳葵秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央与日鞠秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: BG_UpperOffice_Night.jpg Description
desc.jp: BG_UpperOffice_Night.jpg Description

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音和阳葵共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉音认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而阳葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉音产生了严重分歧。莉音试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.jp: BG_IndoorPlaza_Night2.jpg Description

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉音的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
